data.name: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy - Supporter pack
data.detailed_description:
★Supporter Pack★


《Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy》is being developed as we spoke. Purchase the Supporter Pack if you would like to help.

★Cotent★


■ 6 original soundtrack of《Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy: Prologue》.

■ 8 sketches from the artist.

■ 10+ fgimages from the game.

■ Deep appreciation from the developers.

data.short_description: Purchase to support the development of the game, and receive the original soundtrack and concept art selection.

fullgame.name: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
